thread.title: DJ Avicii, electronic dance music star, dead at 28

title: DJ Avicii, electronic dance music star, dead at 28
text:
DJ Avicii, electronic dance music star, dead at 28 3:21am BST - 01:24 
Swedish DJ and record producer Avicii, one of the biggest stars of electronic dance music, was found dead on Friday at the age of 28, his publicist said. Lisa Bernhard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Swedish DJ and record producer Avicii, one of the biggest stars of electronic dance music, was found dead on Friday at the age of 28, his publicist said. Lisa Bernhard reports.
